mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At GIOMEDEX, our mission is to excel as a trusted partner in clinical data management. We are dedicated to building unwavering loyalty by consistently delivering unparalleled services that drive the dynamics of innovation and precision. We contribute to advancing the field of healthcare and research, ensuring the integrity and efficacy of every clinical study we engage in.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Our vision at GIOMEDEX is to be a trailblazer in the realms of clinical data management and biostatistics. We aspire to cultivate enduring relationships with our clients, marked by mutual loyalty founded on the reliability and quality of our services. Through innovation, we aim to be at the forefront of transformative advancements in healthcare and research. We envision making meaningful contributions that improve public health and elevate the impact and success of our clients' endeavors.

principles.title: 4 Core Principles
principles.content: Trust, Transparency, Flexibility, Quality: At GIOMEDEX, our core values guide our interactions and drive our commitment to excellence. We prioritize trust, ensuring a transparent partnership that adapts to our clients' needs with flexibility, all while maintaining an unwavering focus on delivering quality work.

know-how.title: Our Know-How
know-how.content1: GIOMEDEX stands as an experienced partner for government and public health organizations in the fields of statistics, bioinformatics, & data management. Our innovative solutions are strategically designed to address the key priorities of our clients—reducing time to market, cutting costs, and enhancing quality.
know-how.content2: Proficient in SAS and R programming and tools, we specialize in data analysis, ensuring GLP compliance, and maintaining a deep understanding of 21 CFR Part 11 regulations. Our adept team excels in crafting and reviewing statistical sections of protocols, developing SAP and SAR documents, and consulting with researchers on study design, sample size calculations, and analysis methods for studies of varying complexity.
know-how.content3: FDA-Approved Data Analyses: We are proud to have contributed to the success of several drugs that have received FDA approval. Our rigorous data analysis processes ensure the highest standards, making us a trusted partner in your journey towards regulatory success

whyGiomedex.title: Why GIOMEDEX?
whyGiomedex.content1: Cost-Effective Solutions: We offer competitive rates that deliver maximum value without compromising on quality. For clients opting to work with R instead of SAS, we have implemented a major savings plan that allows them to achieve significant cost savings while still receiving top-notch service.
whyGiomedex.content2: Compliance and Security: We prioritize data protection regulations and maintain rigorous information security measures. With all necessary SOPs in place and multiple client audits under our belt, you can trust us to safeguard your data.
whyGiomedex.content3: Flexible Contract Negotiations: We're known for our cooperative approach to contract negotiations, ensuring a smooth and mutually beneficial process.
whyGiomedex.content4: Global Reach: With entities in the EU, US, Mexico and the Caucasus Region, we offer global expertise and support tailored to your needs.
whyGiomedex.content5: Client Satisfaction: Our track record speaks for itself. References from our satisfied clients are available upon request, demonstrating our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
whyGiomedex.content6: Value Creation: By ensuring data accuracy, compliance with regulatory standards, and timely delivery of insights, we empower our clients to make informed decisions, accelerate drug development timelines, and ultimately improve patient outcomes.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities:
responsibilities.text1: Statistical Analysis Planning: Develop and implement statistical analysis plans for clinical trials, ensuring alignment with study objectives.
responsibilities.text2: Data Analysis: Conduct thorough data analysis using SAS and/or R programming, providing statistical insights to support decision-making in clinical development.
responsibilities.text3: Protocol Development: Collaborate with cross-functional teams in crafting and reviewing statistical sections of study protocols.
responsibilities.text4: Regulatory Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant regulations, including a deep understanding of 21 CFR Part 11, and contribute to the preparation of regulatory submissions.
responsibilities.text5: Clinical Study Reports: Review and provide expertise on statistical sections of Clinical Study Reports, ensuring accuracy and adherence to study objectives
responsibilities.text6: Consultation: Provide expert guidance to researchers on study design, sample size calculations, and appropriate statistical methodologies.
responsibilities.text7: Project Management: Contribute to project management activities, ensuring timelines and deliverables are met efficiently.

requirements.title: Requirements:
requirements.text1: Master's or Ph.D. in Statistics, Biostatistics, or a related field.
requirements.text2: Proven experience as a Biostatistician in the pharmaceutical or clinical research industry.
requirements.text3: Proficiency in SAS and/or R programming.Strong knowledge of statistical methodologies, clinical trial design, and regulatory requirements.
